p: Please give me the dimensions of your table top by return mail, and tell me again how long the legs should be.
I have the impression that you are putting sloping sides on the top, like this: top sides
Is this correct? If so, what is the width of the side pieces? And what is the length of the vertical dotted line above?
If the top stuff is warped, could it be soaked & placed under heavy weight for straightening?
In this case, it's the top that the table is being made for, because of its family associations. The legs are just necessary business! They're beng sawed out now, & I want to bring
the fastening along, so that you have only the top to do.
